name: Dead Star
description:
Dead Star is an arcade game developed by Armature. It was originally released in 2015. Armature published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Dead Star is available on PC and PlayStation 4.
Gregory John, John Cornfield, Jonathan Zamkoff and Muse produced the game. Dominic Robilliard and Mark Pacini directed the game. Marc Schaefgen and Sam Marshall scored the game.
